title: Deceived
description: Since the fairies and the vampires launched their attack. Kimâ€™s family is now changed forever. Kim may never recover from the loss of the two men she loved most in this world. But she will not be alone as she picks herself back up and starts the hunt for the ones responsible for this horrible act. She has hers sons and Robert to help her for now. She is sure that more will join with her to fight as her journey continues.
author: Kellie Zottman
